last_episode_to_air.name: Alice
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dana finds herself in a dire situation. Kevin chases a runaway slave. Tom seeks to restate order on his plantation.

name: Kindred
overview: A young aspiring writer discovers secrets about her family's past when she finds herself mysteriously being pulled back and forth in time to a 19th century plantation.
tagline: Question the ties that bind through time.

episodes.name: Dana
episodes.overview: Dana comes to town expecting a warm welcome from family, but she’s met with the opposite. Some comfort arrives in the form of a new friend.

episodes.name: Sabina
episodes.overview: A nosy neighbor puts the wrong kind of spotlight on Dana before a nasty fall triggers a trip back to the past. Kevin gains firsthand experience of Dana’s troubles as the pair are forced to play uncomfortable roles in order to stay out of harm’s way.

episodes.name: Furniture
episodes.overview: Dana and Olivia search for the answer to what keeps bringing Dana back to the past. Kevin acts the gracious party goer at the behest of his hosts.

episodes.name: The Waiter from Two Nights Ago
episodes.overview: Back in Los Angeles, Dana and Kevin prepare to return to the past but have to deal with the familial fallout of their travels.

episodes.name: Winnie
episodes.overview: Dana and Kevin find themselves back on the farm. A confrontation with Olivia makes Dana reevaluate her purpose. Kevin must find a way to explain his mysterious return to the Weylin family.

episodes.name: Celeste
episodes.overview: The enslaved population faces unforeseen consequences from Dana’s well-meaning actions. Margaret’s search for Rufus’s future wife finds Kevin drawn deeper into the family drama.

episodes.name: Jane
episodes.overview: Tom takes Kevin and Rufus on a trip to town. Without Kevin’s protection on the plantation, Dana struggles with a vengeful Margaret.

episodes.name: Alice
episodes.overview: Dana finds herself in a dire situation. Kevin chases a runaway slave. Tom seeks to restate order on his plantation.
